SubSections.Title: Spot Hidden Objects
SubSections.Content: Find concealed compartments, doors, or hidden items.

SubSections.Title: Eavesdrop
SubSections.Content: Overhear conversations without being noticed.

SubSections.Title: Watch For Tells
SubSections.Content: Identify nervous habits, deception, or subtle social cues.

SubSections.Title: Detect Disturbances
SubSections.Content: Notice small changes in an environment, such as moved objects or recent activity.

SubSections.Title: Identify Fake Documents
SubSections.Content: Detect inconsistencies in forged IDs, contracts, or official papers.

SubSections.Title: Follow Gaze
SubSections.Content: Determine what someone is paying attention to based on small eye movements.

SubSections.Title: Reconstruct Scene
SubSections.Content: Identify clues and reconstruct past actions at a site.

SubSections.Title: Track Target
SubSections.Content: Follow someone’s physical trail through urban or wilderness environments.

SubSections.Title: Analyze Materials
SubSections.Content: Detect and identify out of place chemicals, toxins, poisons, or magical residues.

SubSections.Title: Determine Cause of Injury
SubSections.Content: Examine wounds to discern what kind of weapon or force was used.

SubSections.Title: Identify Fingerprints
SubSections.Content: Lift, compare, and match fingerprints to known records or individuals.

SubSections.Title: Trace Biological Samples
SubSections.Content: Determine identity related details from blood, hair, or tissue samples.

SubSections.Title: Spot Inconsistencies
SubSections.Content: Notice logical inconsistencies in reports, testimonies, or statements.

SubSections.Title: Build Psychological Profile
SubSections.Content: Infer a person’s habits, motivations, or likely actions based on their current or past behavior.

SubSections.Title: Reconstruct Timeline
SubSections.Content: Connect events based on evidence, witness accounts, and logical sequence.

SubSections.Title: Spot Oddities
SubSections.Content: Quickly find out of place objects.

SubSections.Title: Assess Motive
SubSections.Content: Determine why someone took a particular action by analyzing their circumstances.

SubSections.Title: Set Up Stakeout
SubSections.Content: Monitor a location for extended periods while remaining unnoticed.

SubSections.Title: Plant Bug
SubSections.Content: Discreetly place listening or tracking devices to gather information.

SubSections.Title: Use Disguises for Observation
SubSections.Content: Blend into an area for long periods of time using clothing or behavior to gather intelligence unnoticed.

SubSections.Title: Detect Tailing
SubSections.Content: Realize when you are being followed, watched, or otherwise tracked.

SubSections.Title: Pattern Recognition
SubSections.Content: Identify recurring behaviors or movement patterns unique to a target.

SubSections.Title: Wound Dressing
SubSections.Content: Clean, bandage, and protect injuries to prevent infection.

SubSections.Title: Set Broken Bones
SubSections.Content: Align and stabilize fractures for proper healing.

SubSections.Title: Stop Bleeding
SubSections.Content: Apply pressure or clotting agents to halt excessive blood loss.

SubSections.Title: Administer Injections
SubSections.Content: Safely deliver medicines or vaccines through intramuscular or intravenous means.

SubSections.Title: Pain Management
SubSections.Content: Select and apply appropriate pain relievers, anesthetics, or relaxation techniques.

SubSections.Title: Remove Foreign Objects
SubSections.Content: Safely extract bullets, shards, or embedded debris from wounds.

SubSections.Title: Measure Vital Signs
SubSections.Content: Assess blood pressure, pulse, and breathing rate to check health status.

SubSections.Title: Identify Common Illnesses
SubSections.Content: Recognize symptoms and diagnose frequently encountered diseases.

SubSections.Title: Perform Physical Examination
SubSections.Content: Check muscle strength, reflexes, and overall bodily condition.

SubSections.Title: Check Nutritional Deficiencies
SubSections.Content: Determine if a person is lacking essential vitamins or minerals.

SubSections.Title: Assess Immune Health
SubSections.Content: Evaluate how well a patient’s system resists infections.

SubSections.Title: Identify Substances
SubSections.Content: Recognize medical drugs, toxins, or chemical compounds in a sample.

SubSections.Title: Detect Contaminants
SubSections.Content: Find impurities or unwanted additives in medicines, supplements, or food.

SubSections.Title: Analyze Drug Effects
SubSections.Content: Determine the expected reactions, side effects, and potency of a medication.

SubSections.Title: Check Drug Interactions
SubSections.Content: Predict how multiple substances might react when taken together.

SubSections.Title: Extract Active Ingredients
SubSections.Content: Isolate key parts of a medicinal plant or chemical for use in treatments.

SubSections.Title: Assess Mental State
SubSections.Content: Evaluate a person’s mood, emotional stability, or psychological well-being.

SubSections.Title: Detect Stress
SubSections.Content: Identify signs of mental strain and stress.

SubSections.Title: Detect Hidden Emotions
SubSections.Content: Identify suppressed emotions.

SubSections.Title: Guide Relaxation
SubSections.Content: Help people overcome fear or panic using calming techniques.

SubSections.Title: Evaluate Truth Avoidance
SubSections.Content: Analyze speech and behavior to determine if someone is avoiding to talk about or face the truth, or is otherwise lying to themself.

SubSections.Title: Detect Mental Illnesses
SubSections.Content: Identify signs for mental illnesses.
